name: antsama
text: if there was a gay porn God there would be an actor known as Circus Penis.  Being a cat is optional.

name: chaesar
text: Where are the 5s?? C'mon!! "It's the Circus Penis way" People live and die without hearing one liners as awesome as that.

name: daaaaang
text: I rated it 5 for exactly this reason

name: bozendoka
text: I rated it 5 for the awesome hat potential.  But I'm still with you.

name: closefriend
text: I like how all the cats have hairstyles that are just human hairstyles with the ears moved but the space made for them not moved.

name: peterjoel
text: Ray's glasses exhibit the same phenomenon.

name: belgand
text: Yeah, since his ears are on top of his head... how is he keeping those on?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i never wondered about that.

until now.

crap.

name: junko
text: Despite Teodor's thoughts in the second panel, this is the first appearance of Circus Penis.

name: hereward
text: It seems like Teoder recognises him from porn but doesn't want the guys to know this. (next panel.)

name: benthecartoon
text: That's my favorite part, how Teodor recognizes but pretends not to know him. For appearances.

name: deancain29
text: 4.1 rating? c'mon - this is the essence of Achewood. 5 all the way!!

name: jesler729
text: Circus Penis... I dunno. He kinda creeps me out here.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Oh man, is it bad that I thought "Circus Penis looks like Chuck Norris".

name: pepperhittherim
text: The goatee makes me imagine Circus Penis' mouth functions somewhat like the Predator's

name: achilleselbow
text: I'd rather not think about how Circus Penis' mouth functions.

name: hateandwar
text: How is Circus Penis not the best God damn name there is.

name: diggidy
text: He was pretty lucky, actually.  His family pet was Circus the dog, and he grew up on Penis Avenue.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: How long have you had Circus Penis envy that your mom didn't name you that?

name: godfatherofsouls
text: It's the Circus Penis way. [NWS]

name: abe
text: Ew.

name: numberkillinger
text: "nothing less than a foot long allowed"

name: gigs
text:
Man, that's just disappointingly boring. No clowns or juggling or any references to its name AT ALL.

Way to waste your domain name, fellas.

name: tekende
text: When Circus Penis moves forward it is a Serious Thing. Your can had best be ready for some Serious rocking.

name: ford
text:
what sort of rocking, you may ask?

That's right, can-rocking

name: baryonyx
text: What I want to know is who this army is going to fight.

name: ananke
text: Who cares?  They will have awesome hats.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Armies don't only fight, you know.

name: sp1derbaby
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: sp1derbaby
text: At least it's appropriate that they couldn't fit in the frame.

name: charchar
text:
I picture Circus Penis talking with some sort of Scandinavian accent (Scandinavians feel free to help me pinpoint it.)

ALSO, Why is it that The Circus Penis Army is less worrying to me than a circus penis army?

name: deptford
text:
Another example of the alt text really making the whole comic.

Just LOOK at Ray in the tenth panel. He's just pleased to be a fly on this great wall.

name: fineoakstructure
text: EVERYONE (AWESOME) HAT

name: miku224
text: Why do I have absolutely no recollection of this strip?  Was it one of the subscriber-only ones that got released later to the general public?

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Nope. In fact, it was part of "Hat Week" (see alt text on this strip ).

It's probably more notable as the strip that introduced the mysterious "Darlene"...

[SPOILER]

...a character elaborated on a short 7 years later.

name: philophobe
text:
I, for one, would like to know why Teodor is surprised to see that Circus Penis looks healthy.

Also, Circus Penis's beard would appear to be both above his actual lips and below his actual chin. I want there to be some kind of porn-y reason for this.

name: irishguy
text: Circus Penis looks so healthy because of all the f-f-fuckin' he's been doin'!

name: vulpes-aurum
text:
Speaking of awesome hats...

[IMGS OFF]

name: mangtastic
text: Hahaha what
